sentences.sContent: Skeletal remodeling is controlled by the actions of many different hormones, including vitamin D and parathyroid hormone (PTH).
sentences.sContent_eng: Skeletal remodeling is controlled by the actions of many different hormones, including vitamin D and parathyroid hormone (PTH).
sentences.sCn: 骨重建是由很多不同激素它们的功能所控制的，其中包括维生素D和甲状旁腺素。

sentences.sContent: It was two months after my kidney stones were discovered that doctors finally diagnosed the growth on my parathyroid gland. And in those months, my state deteriorated further.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was two months after my kidney stones were discovered that doctors finally diagnosed the growth on my parathyroid gland. And in those months, my state deteriorated further.
sentences.sCn: 在我肾结石被发现两个月后，医生最终将病情诊断为甲状旁腺亢进。而我的身体状况也在这两个月里变得更加糟糕。

sentences.sContent: The culprits in all this are the parathyroid glands.
sentences.sContent_eng: The culprits in all this are the parathyroid glands.
sentences.sCn: 这一切的罪魁祸首就是甲状旁腺。
